00022 // Set texture to be active
00023 bool TextureManager::SetActiveTexture(unsigned int texID)
00024 {
00025         // Enable and bind the passed in texture
00026         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00027         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texID);
00028 
00029         return true;
00030 }
00031 
00032 // Load texture from file
00033 int TextureManager::LoadTexture(std::string filePath)
00034 {
00035         // Check to see if texture is already loaded and in map, and return texID if true
00036         if (TexLoaded(filePath) != 0)
00037         {
00038                 std::cout << "File already loaded: " << filePath << std::endl;
00039                 return TexLoaded(filePath);
00040         }
00041 
00042         // Load in the file
00043         //GLuint newTex = SOIL_load_OGL_texture
00044         //(
00045         //      file,
00046         //      SOIL_LOAD_AUTO,
00047         //      SOIL_CREATE_NEW_ID,
00048         //      SOIL_FLAG_INVERT_Y | SOIL_FLAG_COMPRESS_TO_DXT | SOIL_FLAG_DDS_LOAD_DIRECT
00049         //);
00050 
00052         //if (newTex == 0)
00053         //{
00054         //      std::cout << "SOIL loading error: " << filename << " - " << SOIL_last_result() << std::endl;
00055         //      return -1;
00056         //}
00057 
00058         // Generate a new texID
00059         GLuint newTex;
00060         glGenTextures(1, &newTex);
00061 
00062         int width, height, nrComponents;
00063         unsigned char* data = stbi_load(filePath.c_str(), &width, &height, &nrComponents, 0);
00064         if (data)
00065         {
00066                 GLenum format;
00067                 if (nrComponents == 1)
00068                         format = GL_RED;
00069                 else if (nrComponents == 3)
00070                         format = GL_RGB;
00071                 else if (nrComponents == 4)
00072                         format = GL_RGBA;
00073 
00074                 m_width = width;
00075                 m_height = height;
00076 
00077                 // Bind the texture
00078                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, newTex);
00079                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, format, width, height, 0, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
00080                 glGenerateMipmap(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00081 
00082                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);
00083                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_REPEAT);
00084                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00085                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00086 
00087                 stbi_image_free(data);
00088 
00089                 // Increment number of textures and return ID
00090                 m_numTextures++;
00091                 std::cout << "Successfully added Texture. Texture Count = " << m_numTextures << std::endl;
00092         }
00093         else
00094         {
00095                 std::cout << "Texture failed to load: " << filePath << std::endl;
00096                 stbi_image_free(data);
00097         }
00098 
00099         // Add new texture to make
00100         AddTextureToMap(filePath, newTex);
00101 
00102         return newTex;
00103 }
00104 
00105 // Add loaded texture to map
00106 void TextureManager::AddTextureToMap(std::string filename, int texID)
00107 {
00108         // If loaded texture is not already in map, load it
00109         if (!m_textureMap[filename])
00110         {
00111                 m_textureMap[filename] = texID;
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 // Return a texture ID
00116 int TextureManager::GetTextureID(std::string filename)
00117 {
00118         // Get iterator to start of map
00119         std::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned int>::iterator it = m_textureMap.begin();
00120 
00121         // Search map for texture
00122         while (it != m_textureMap.end())
00123         {
00124                 // If texture found, return the given ID
00125                 if ((*it).first == filename)
00126                 {
00127                         return (*it).second;
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 // Increment iterator
00131                 it++;
00132         }
00133 
00134         // If texture is not in map, load it in and add to map
00135         int texID = LoadTexture(filename);
00136 
00137         // Return texture ID
00138         return texID;
00139 }
00140 
00141 // Release all textures from memory
00142 void TextureManager::ReleaseAllTextures()
00143 {
00144         // Get iterator to start of map
00145         std::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned int>::iterator it = m_textureMap.begin();
00146 
00147         // Loop through map, unloading all textures from map
00148         while (it != m_textureMap.end())
00149         {
00150                 std::cout << "unloading Texture: " << (*it).first << ", ID: " << (*it).second;
00151                 glDeleteTextures(1, &(*it).second);
00152                 std::cout << " ... done" << std::endl;
00153                 ++it;
00154         }
00155 
00156         // Clear the map
00157         m_textureMap.clear();
00158 }
00159 
00160 // Check to see if a texture is already loaded or not
00161 int TextureManager::TexLoaded(std::string filePath)
00162 {
00163         // Get iterator to start of map
00164         std::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned int>::iterator it = m_textureMap.begin();
00165 
00166         // Search map for texture
00167         while (it != m_textureMap.end())
00168         {
00169                 // If texture found, return true
00170                 if ((*it).first == filePath)
00171                 {
00172                         return (*it).second;;
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 // Increment iterator
00176                 it++;
00177         }
00178 
00179         // If texture not found, return 0
00180         return 0;
00181 }
